meanings.definition: A compound of fluorine with another element or radical.
meanings.sent1: The dentist recommended using fluorid toothpaste to protect my teeth.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of different fluorid compounds.
meanings.sent3: The fluorid compound and the other element formed a strong bond.
meanings.sent4: The fluorid mixture was as powerful as a superhero's shield.
meanings.sent5: The bright green color of the fluorid compound made it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: To treat or impregnate with a fluoride.
meanings.sent1: The dentist will fluorid my teeth during the next appointment.
meanings.sent2: It is important to fluorid the water to prevent tooth decay.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally fluorid my shirt with toothpaste instead of laundry detergent.
meanings.sent4: The chef decided to fluorid the dish with a hint of mint for a fresh taste.
meanings.sent5: The gardener will fluorid the plants with a special fertilizer for better growth.
